One: I would die to recover an ancient relic of my faith that was lost long ago.
Two: I will someday get revenge on the corrupt temple hierarchy who branded me a heretic.
Three: I owe my life to the priest who took me in when my parents died.
Four: Everything I do is for the common people.
Five: I will do anything to protect the temple where I served.
Six: I seek to preserve a sacred text that my enemies consider heretical and seek to destroy.

One: I fleeced the wrong person and must work to ensure that this individual never crosses paths with me or those I care about.
Two: I owe everything to my mentor - a horrible person who's probably rotting in jail somewhere.
Three: Somewhere out there: I have a child who doesn't know me. I'm making the world better for him or her.
Four: I come from a noble family: and one day I'll reclaim my lands and title from those who stole them from me.
Five: A powerful person killed someone I love. Some day soon: I'll have my revenge.
Six: I swindled and ruined a person who didn't deserve it. I seek to atone for my misdeeds but might never be able to forgive myself.

One: I'm trying to pay off an old debt I owe to a generous benefactor.
Two: My ill-gotten gains go to support my family.
Three: Something important was taken from me: and I aim to steal it back.
Four: I will become the greatest thief that ever live.
Five: I'm guilty of a terrible crime. I hope I can redeem myself for it.
Six: Someone I loved died because of a mistake I made. That will never happen again.

One: My instrument is my most treasured possession: and it reminds me of someone I love.
Two: Someone stole my precious instrument: and someday I'll get it back.
Three: I want to be famous: whatever it takes.
Four: I idolize a hero of the old tales and measure my deeds against that person's.
Five: I will do anything to prove myself superior to my hated rival.
Six: I would do anything for the other members of my old troupe.

One: I have a family: but I have no idea where they are. One day: I hope to see them again.
Two: I worked the land: I love the land: and I will protect the land.
Three: A proud noble once gave me a horrible beating: and I will take my revenge on any bully I encounter.
Four: My tools are symbols of my past life: and I carry them so that I wll never forget my roots.
Five: I protect those who cannot protect themselves.
Six: I wish my childhood sweetheart had come with me to pursue my destiny.

One: The workshop where I learned my trade is the most important place in the world to me.
Two: I created a great work for someone: and then found them unworthy to receive it. I'm still looking for someone worthy.
Three: I owe my guild a great debt for forging me into the person I am today.
Four: I pursue wealth to secure someone's love.
Five: One day I will return to my guild and prove that I am the greatest artisan of them all.
Six: I will get revenge on the evil forces that destroyed my place of business and ruined my livelihood.
